posts.post_content:
I still think this card isn't that good at mythic rare, at rare maybe.. realistically its still a slow leveler that can only be leveled in red mana and is actually worse than sveral similiar cards you could be playing for the same mana. It also dies to anything, which normally wouldn't matter so much, except you have to sink so much mana into it. With smother in standard I just plain wouldn't play this.
  
   
I could see more application with time of heroes.

Posted By: AngelxLegna (4/16/2010 9:06:41 AM)

posts.post_content:
[Grizzly Bears](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grizzly Bears) -> Overcosted [Air elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Air elemental) -> Overcosted [Hellkite Overlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hellkite Overlord) minus regenerate.  
  
My inner red player is crying at how slow this card is. "Staying power" is never something I would aim for when making a mono-red deck; I would rather kill you now than have the option to maybe (over)kill you later. Level-up and red were just never meant to be together. And even if you level it up to max (which is really the only reason you would play it), it's most likely been on the field for at least three turns, which it plenty of time for your opponent to draw removal...  
  
Sure, you can go on and dream about that one time it was dropped turn two, leveled to 4 at turn 4 and swung for 4, and leveled to max at turn 5 and swung for 9 w/ firebreathing. Congratz, you just put three turns worth of eggs in the same unshrouded basket. It will make Timmies happy, it will make midrange players who would like to try red happy, but it does n... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Posted By: Donovan_Fabian (4/21/2010 10:16:42 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Yeah took me a sec to realize how good this guy is, but he is good. Turn 5 he's basically a 12/8 flying trampler. But come on, you gotta run protection for this guy, which means you have to splash. Which also means you may not have the right mana for your Turn 5 Level 8. This guy's pretty mythic in the fact that once he get's going he's crazy with the damage, but you better have that counterspell or two handy.

This guy's pretty mythic in the fact that once he get's going he's crazy with the damage, but you better have that counterspell or two handy.
